name: Lost In The Chest
description:
Deliver lost items to new adventurers in the dungeon !

Game entry for 2021 GGJ : Lost & Found.

A special thanks to :

  • The Developer for its unvaluable Outline shader
  • Dented Pixel for bringing life to this adventure
  • Ajay Karat because otherwise game would have been cube serving cubes to other cubes ...
  • Devtoid because what would dungeon be without gold coins ?!
